scripts.build:libs: lerna run build --parallel --scope navmesh --scope phaser-navmesh --scope phaser2-navmesh
scripts.watch:libs: lerna run watch --parallel --scope navmesh --scope phaser-navmesh --scope phaser2-navmesh
scripts.dev:phaser2: concurrently "lerna run watch --scope '{navmesh,phaser2-navmesh}'" "lerna run serve --scope examples-phaser2"
scripts.dev:phaser3: concurrently "lerna run watch --scope '{navmesh,phaser-navmesh}'" "lerna run serve --scope examples-phaser3"
scripts.dev:node: concurrently "lerna run watch --scope navmesh" "lerna run serve --scope examples-node"
